cameraoverhaul.config.title: CameraOverhaul Settings
cameraoverhaul.config.configVersion.name: Config Version
cameraoverhaul.config.enabled.name: Enable the mod's effects
cameraoverhaul.config.enabled.desc: Toggles all of the mod's features.
cameraoverhaul.config.enableInThirdPerso: Disable this to make the mod's effects exclusive to first-person view.
cameraoverhaul.config.strafingRollFactor: Strength of the camera roll rotation caused by strafing, or sideway horizontal velocity.
cameraoverhaul.config.forwardVelocityPit: Strength of camera pitch rotations caused by moving forward or backwards.
cameraoverhaul.config.verticalVelocityPi: Strength of camera pitch rotations caused by vertical velocity.
cameraoverhaul.config.horizontalVelocity: Smoothness of camera pitch & roll rotations caused by moving horizontally.
cameraoverhaul.config.verticalVelocitySm: Smoothness of camera pitch rotations caused by moving vertically.
cameraoverhaul.config.turningRollAccumul: Sensitivity of the camera roll rotation caused by turning around horizontally.
cameraoverhaul.config.turningRollIntensi: Maximum strength of the camera roll rotation caused by turning around horizontally.
cameraoverhaul.config.turningRollSmoothi: Smoothness of the decay of the camera roll rotation caused by turning around horizontally.
cameraoverhaul.config.cameraSwayIntensit: Strength of smooth random sway that kicks in when the player idles for enough time.
cameraoverhaul.config.cameraSwayFrequenc: Frequency of smooth random sway that kicks in when the player idles for enough time.
cameraoverhaul.config.cameraSwayFadeInDe: Amount of time that the player must idle for before smooth random sway starts to fade-in.
cameraoverhaul.config.cameraSwayFadeInLe: Amount of time it takes for smooth random sway to fade-in after the player idles for enough time.
cameraoverhaul.config.cameraSwayFadeOutL: Amount of time it takes for smooth random sway to fade-out when the player starts moving after idling.
